plot: Introspective journey of a nameless character, overwhelmed by sin that turns into a personal redemption, a self-inflicted punishment that allows him to take away from this reality his sins to rid the world and take them in the air.
title: Aria
plot_es: Introspective journey of a nameless character, overwhelmed by sin that turns into a personal redemption, a self-inflicted punishment that allows him to take away from this reality his sins to rid the world and take them in the air.
plot_en: Introspective journey of a nameless character, overwhelmed by sin that turns into a personal redemption, a self-inflicted punishment that allows him to take away from this reality his sins to rid the world and take them in the air.
